snippet: Monday’s selections from around the Web include a question about how a potential feature of the new iPhones, biometric unlocking, could be hacked. Plus, a profile of Gen. Keith Alexander as his not-so-secret N.S.A. programs are increasingly exposed...
abstract: Monday’s selections from around the Web include a question about how a potential feature of the new iPhones, biometric unlocking, could be hacked. Plus, a profile of Gen. Keith Alexander as his not-so-secret N.S.A. programs are increasingly exposed and scrutinized.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Hacking Fingerprint Logins and the Cowboy of the N.S.A.
